Control Name: ACCESS RESTRICTIONS FOR CHANGE | AUTOMATED ACCESS ENFORCEMENT / AUDITING
Control Statement: The information system enforces access restrictions and supports auditing of the enforcement actions.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: AU-2, AU-12, AU-6, CM-3, CM-6.
